item.title: Optimizing Microsoft 365 licensing. Part 2 - License optimization
item.description: This article will dive deep into license optimization. Which reports and measurements available to us can guide the decision on which license package a user needs? If you haven’t already, I recommend reading through part 1 of this series to get a brief understanding of license profiles. I will be referring to some terms introduced there. If you are already familiar with Microsoft 365 licensing this is the place to start.

item.title: Optimizing Microsoft 365 licensing. Part 1 - License basics
item.description: It’s that time of the year. You have one month before the yearly license numbers are due to be delivered to Microsoft. The questions have started pouring in. Can we make any savings? Are we utilizing all the features we have purchased? Do we have enough licenses for all our workloads? Are we even compliant? This guide focuses on the things I consider to be the most important when designing your license strategy.
